description.value: Constant Combat Training: All fortress world characters begin with Basic Weapon Training (Las or SP). However, they suffer a −5 penalty on Social Interaction Tests regarding non-combat topics (GM's discretion).

system.benefit: You gain Basic Weapon Training (Las) or (SP). You suffer −5 on Social Interaction Tests regarding non-combat topics.
system.notes: Grants choice of Basic Weapon Training; −5 to social tests on non-combat topics

specialAbilities.name: Combat Training
specialAbilities.description: Choose one: Basic Weapon Training (Las) or Basic Weapon Training (SP)
